title: 122 Rules: A Sam Bradford Federal Assassin Thriller Book 1
description: Sam Bradford—former Marine turned government assassin—has no wife, no friends, and no family. He lives only for the job.The dutiful soldier, he’s spent his second career following orders from The Agency—a secret wet work US federal organization that, on paper, doesn’t exist.But during a hit targeting a mob kingpin, Sam hesitates to pull the trigger. Something feels…off, and he’s compelled to learn more.Using the skills gained as a covert operative, Sam reveals a devious conspiracy suggesting subterfuge and corruption in the upper echelons of political power. His assignment wasn’t to eliminate an enemy of the people but a witness who could topple a criminal empire.Now a vigilante on the run and with a target on his back, Sam teams up with his former mark. In a pulse-pounding race across the country, they must unearth the conspirators and expose the truth before The Agency puts them both in the ground.Punctuated by breathless pacing, tenacious suspense, and brilliant comedic touches, Deek Rhew’s explosive debut thriller, 122 Rules, is perfect for fans of Brad Thor, Dean Koontz, and Nelson DeMille.
author: Deek Rhew
